title: I poorly made something ....
body:
I’m hoping the gifs I made here aren’t too crappy and I’m also hoping someone does a WAY better job of making this scene into a gif so I can reblog it :)

But honestly watching Good Omens, this scene was outstanding. The way Crowley kind of breaks down saying that last line…. ooh man.

so I had to make this little GIFset

reblog.comment:

summary: Omg so I'm watching 7Up & Me and Michael is on it and they were showing clips from him as a young boy and from his first acting...
body: Omg so I’m watching 7Up & Me and Michael is on it and they were showing clips from him as a young boy and from his first acting job (he’s so fucking cute) and he just said “if I saw myself at that age now I’d run up and punch him in the face” like???? But why?? You’re beautiful??

reblog.comment: Omg so I’m watching 7Up & Me and Michael is on it and they were showing clips from him as a young boy and from his first acting job (he’s so fucking cute) and he just said “if I saw myself at that age now I’d run up and punch him in the face” like???? But why?? You’re beautiful??

summary: Aziraphale Is in Love With Crowley in Good Omens, According to Michael Sheen
title: Aziraphale Is in Love With Crowley in Good Omens, According to Michael Sheen
excerpt: Actor Michael Sheen, who plays the angel Aziraphale, is adamant that his character is in love with David Tennant's demon Crowley.

summary: You Knew Them Before They were Cool
title: You Knew Them Before They were Cool
body:
Michael Sheen

Underworld: Evolution (2006) - Lucian 
the Twilight Saga (2008) - Aro
Good Omens (2019) - Aziraphale 

David Tennant 

Harry Potter and Goblet of Fire (2005) - Barty Crouch Jr.
Doctor Who (2005) - the 10th Doctor
Good Omens (20190 - Crowley

Tom Ellis

Merlin BBC (2008) - King Cenred
Once Upon a time (2013) - Robin Hood
Lucifer (2016) - Lucifer
